creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: applique and embroidery, red, green, white, black; many narrow bands surrounding on 3 sides; center long panel of black corduroy; red print ties; some bands sewn on through blue backing
